section.p: Indicates drgree of plaque buildup during treatment planning.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] plaqueIndex with data type Code
Indicates the degree of plaque buildup.

Contains exactly one [1..1] psrScore, where its type is Psr Score Observation
PSR Score Observation.
